summary: Adds a Human Elf follower into Jorrvaskr, she is marriageable and set as essential.
descriptionHtml:
I\'m new to the Creation Kit, just a simple follower mod
Sellia was my character in Skyrim for a while, and I wanted to create her into a follower.
She is a ranger type follower and is level 37, she comes with full Elven (no helmet) and comes with 1000 Elven arrows, an Elven bow and and 2 Elven swords for dual wielding.
You can find her in Jorrvaskr (Companions building) sitting in a chair.
If you want her to look exactly the same as in the pictures you will need; Enhanced Character Edit, SG Female Textures Renewal, Any body mod really (I use Dream Girl), Apachii Sky Hair & Apachii Sky Hair Female, and Eyes of Beauty.

-Learning how to create standalone followers, once I\'m done with that I could make Sellia standalone.

-Please add your own images if you can, I took these ones in around 5 minutes and I can\'t use ENB\'s xD

========REQUIRED===========================================================================
SKSE
Enhanced Character Edit
SG Female Textures Renewal
Any body that works with SG Female Textures Renewal (UNP,CBBE,DG)
ApachiiSkyHair & ApachiiSkyHairFemale
The Eyes of Beauty (optional)
author: Scraip
